name: StickTogether
description:
STICK TOGETHER' WHERE YOU CONTROL 4 PLAYERS. YOU GOAL IS TO GET THE SMALLEST BLUE SQUAR TO STICK WITH IT AND MAKE IT BIGGER AFTER IT BECOME BEIGGER IT IS ABLE TO BREAK THE WALL IN FRONT OF IT AND LETS YOU PASS THROUGH THE NEXT LEVEL. YOU BECOME STRONGER TO BREAK DOOR IF YOU JOIN TOGETHER, THUS "STRONGER TOGETHER "

GAME FOR : BRACKYES GAME JAM 2021.1
